title: Honor Magic 4 Ultimate packs the best camera hardware Honor has on offer this year
content:
At MWC 2022 last month, Honor unveiled two new flagships: Honor Magic 4 and Magic 4 Pro. The Chinese company has now added a third model — Honor Magic 4 Ultimate — to the lineup, which packs even more impressive camera hardware. Honor Magic 4 Ultimate: Specifications Specification Honor Magic 4 Ultimate Dimensions and Weight

The post Honor Magic 4 Ultimate packs the best camera hardware Honor has on offer this year appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Honor Magic 4 Ultimate is the latest entry in Honor's flagship lineup. It packs impressive camera hardware, including a custom image processor.
